_description: ‘Against Women Inconstant’ or ‘Newfangelnesse’, perhaps by Chaucer — a balade, three stanzas rhyme royal

BodFair16.First Lines:
Madame that throgh your newfangelnesseMany a seruaunt haue put out
                    of your grace…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…Alle lyght for somer ye wote wel what I meneIn sted of bliw
                    thus may ye were al grene
